Tempest of Triumph.name: Tempest of Triumph
Tempest of Triumph.fullText:
Battlelord of Kord Attack 11Tempest of Triumph

Your killing blow sets off a chain reaction of inspired attacks, potentially laying low all your foes.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier + Charisma modifier damage. If this attack reduces the target to 0 hit points, an ally within 5 squares of you can make a basic attack against a different target as an immediate reaction, adding your Charisma modifier to the damage roll. If that ally’s attack reduces its target to 0 hit points, a different ally within 5 squares of you gains the same benefit. Repeat until an attack fails to reduce a target to 0 hit points or until you run out of allies within 5 squares.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 118.
Tempest of Triumph.flavor: Your killing blow sets off a chain reaction of inspired attacks, potentially laying low all your foes.
Tempest of Triumph.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier + Charisma modifier damage. If this attack reduces the target to 0 hit points, an ally within 5 squares of you can make a basic attack against a different target as an immediate reaction, adding your Charisma modifier to the damage roll. If that ally’s attack reduces its target to 0 hit points, a different ally within 5 squares of you gains the same benefit. Repeat until an attack fails to reduce a target to 0 hit points or until you run out of allies within 5 squares.

Blood-Tested Inspiration.name: Blood-Tested Inspiration
Blood-Tested Inspiration.fullText:
Battlelord of Kord Utility 12Blood-Tested Inspiration

Faith in Kord leads you to amazing exploits during the glory of battle.

Daily        Martial
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Expend one use of inspiring word to regain the use of an encounter attack power you have used during this encounter.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 118.
Blood-Tested Inspiration.flavor: Faith in Kord leads you to amazing exploits during the glory of battle.
Blood-Tested Inspiration.effect: Expend one use of inspiring word to regain the use of an encounter attack power you have used during this encounter.

Path of the Storm.name: Path of the Storm
Path of the Storm.fullText:
Battlelord of Kord Attack 20Path of the Storm

You roam the field like a rogue thunderhead, striking foes as Kord strikes the earth with lightning.

Daily        Martial
Standard Action      Personal

Effect: You can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier. During this movement, you can make a number of melee basic attacks equal to your Charisma modifier against any enemies within reach. Each of the at-tacks must target a different creature.


Update (4/9/2010)
Replace the attack type and range with “Personal.” Replace the last sentence of the Effect entry with “Each of the attacks must target a different creature.” In addition, delete the weapon keyword.

Published in Martial Power, page(s) 118.
Path of the Storm.flavor: You roam the field like a rogue thunderhead, striking foes as Kord strikes the earth with lightning.
Path of the Storm.effect: You can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier. During this movement, you can make a number of melee basic attacks equal to your Charisma modifier against any enemies within reach. Each of the at-tacks must target a different creature.
